movies.title: Poseidon
movies.plot: A packed cruise ship traveling the Atlantic is hit and overturned by a massive wave, compelling the passengers to begin a dramatic fight for their lives.

events.title: the Poseidon is capsized by a rogue wave
guests on board the cruise ship Poseidon prepare to welcome in the New Year

movies.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
movies.plot: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the 'fastest gun in the West'. An eager recruit into James' notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 25 wins & 67 nominations.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.plot: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.

events.title: V blows up the Houses of Parliament, on Guy Fawkes Night
